templates.welcomeDescription: Be welcome to BRASA's UOFT official website
templates.weAreLargest: We are the largest Brazilian student association in Canada!
templates.clubDescription: BRASA at UofT is a vibrant student organization dedicated to connecting Brazilian students at the University of Toronto. We participate in events, organize workshops, and foster a supportive community to redefine possibilities and empower students to achieve more. Through these initiatives, we aim to make an impact on campus and beyond, fostering collaboration, leadership, and a sense of belonging.
templates.subtitleDescription: Empowering and guiding Brazilian students in Canada
templates.becomeMemberDescription: Join BRASA at UofT by joining our WhatsApp group chat and following us on Instagram! You will get to participate in engaging events, and make a difference on campus. With opportunities for networking, leadership, and collaboration, we’re here to help you thrive in your journey.
templates.generalInquiresDescription: Want to get in touch? Fill out the form below and we’ll get back to you within 48 hours.
templates.soccerTeamDescription: After getting 3rd place in the last season, our soccer teams is looking for new players to get the trophy!
templates.volleyballTeamDescription: Having reached the semi-finals twice in only 3 appearances, BRASA Volei is a very chill environment perfect for making friends and competing!
templates.dialogDescription: The best way to join the team is to text our captain!
templates.picnicDescription: Every beginning of the school year, BRASA's welcome picnic takes place in High Park, where we meet up with our friends and get to know the new upcoming students!
templates.hockeyDescription: Come watch the UofT Varsity Team play hockey with us!
templates.danceClassDescription: We had a Brazilian dance workshop, in which we could connect with our culture and learn new moves!
templates.studyWithUsDescription: Finals season is always stressful, but studying with friends is always a good way to relax and be productive at the same time.
